name: Take Control (CameronHowell, Mirko Bug, khhs, RedCubeDev)
name_original: Take Control (CameronHowell, Mirko Bug, khhs, RedCubeDev)
description:
In Take Control you have to control a growing army of Robots.

You can select one of the 3 Groups and give them tasks todo, like building a bridge out of rocks or fighting enemies

How To Play:

Left Click: Move (Hold for continuous movement)

Right Click: Select Bots for teams OR when in "Task Mode" to set the position of things.

Scroll Wheel: Change colors

Info

When your Bots have no task they have a little Flag above their color, click that Flag to give them a task.

To Cancel a Task just remove the Team Color using the Eraser!
